entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
